snippet: Barnes & Noble rethinks the Nook’s priorities, Bob Woodward’s clash with the White House may have been blown out of proportion and a Chrysler commercial creates synergy between Motown and Broadway.
abstract: Barnes & Noble rethinks the Nook’s priorities, Bob Woodward’s clash with the White House may have been blown out of proportion and a Chrysler commercial creates synergy between Motown and Broadway.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Rethinking the Nook and Woodward vs. the White House
